item.title: Prayer bpn13440 in Chichewa
item.description: *Iye amene afuna kunena Pempheroli, ayenera kuyimirira ndipo atembenukire kwa Mulungu, ndipo poimirira pamalo akewo, iye ayangâ€™ane kudzanja lamanja ndi lamanzere, ngati kuti akuyembekezera chifundo cha Ambuye Wake, Wachifundo-Choposa, Womvera Chisoni. Tsono iye anene kuti: O Inu Amene muli Ambuye wamaina onse ndi Mlengi wa miyamba! Ndikupemphani Inu kubzolera mwa iwo Amene ali kasupe a Uweniweni Wanu osaonekawo, Wokwezeka koposa, Waulemelero Onse, kuti mulipange pemphero langa, moto umene uwotche zophimba zimene zanditseka ine kuti ndisaone kukongola Kwanu, ndi kuwala kumene kunditsogolere ine ku nyanja ya kumene Inu Mukupezeka.
